post.description: Process a diagram JSON and create/update a project
Validate correct structure and schema of a diagram JSON
Validate architectural rules and constraints (e.g., security, valid configs)

get.description: Get a list of AWS managed policies, optionally filtered by service

post.description: Create a new IAM role, potentially virtual
Create a new IAM user, potentially virtual

get.description: Get a list of projects with pagination, sorting, and searching

post.description: Create a new project for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a project by its ID

delete.description: Delete a project by its ID

get.description: Get full architecture for a project

patch.description: Update a specific node in architecture

get.description: Calculate the estimated cost for the entire project architecture
Calculate the estimated cost for a specific resource in the project
Get suggestions for cost optimization based on architectural patterns
Generates and downloads the ZIP file of the code

post.description: Create a copy of an existing project and its architecture
Generates IaC files for the specified project and tool
Restore a project to a specific version

get.description: Retrieve the history of versions for a project
Get global cloud configurations like regions, instance types, etc.
Get a list of all supported cloud providers (AWS, GCP, etc.)
Get the JSON structure of resource output models grouped by service category with default mock data
Get a list of all supported resource types, grouped by service category (e.g. Compute, Storage)

content.description: Included in immediate generation response, excluded in history

duration.description: Duration is the duration used for the calculation

period.description: Period is the time period for the estimate

resource_estimates.description: ResourceEstimates contains individual resource cost estimates

total_cost.description: TotalCost is the total estimated cost for the architecture

component_name.description: ComponentName is the name of the cost component

model.description: Model is the pricing model used

subtotal.description: Subtotal is the calculated cost for this component

unit_rate.description: UnitRate is the rate per unit

breakdown.description: Breakdown contains the cost breakdown components

resource_id.description: ResourceID is the domain resource ID

resource_name.description: ResourceName is the name of the resource

resource_type.description: ResourceType is the type of resource

total_cost.description: TotalCost is the total estimated cost for this resource
